about_the_game:
It’s time to sharpen your blades! You have proven to be capable of cracking even the most vicious of crimes, so you get appointed as an official police consultant. Please, postpone the celebration… For now, the body of a judge has been found on the riverbank. As we all know, such a figure makes many enemies among the villains. Anyone could have killed him. However, after examining the crime scene and the body of the deceased, the pool of suspects narrows down dramatically. The clean-shaven chin of Judge Alexander Therpen is complemented by a fine cut in the jugular vein. And then your prime suspect turns belly up as well… but even that stumble won’t stop you, right?

This Collector's Edition includes:

📜 Master Detective Gameplay!
Dive into a compelling criminal case and sharpen your skills in crime investigation. Use your prowess to find hidden objects and solve puzzles and brain teasers, unveiling secrets on the dark, soap-scented streets where danger lurks!

📜 Intriguing Storyline with Deep Mysteries!
As a newly appointed official police consultant known for cracking vicious crimes, navigate through detective games' twists and challenges. Investigate the eerie murder of Judge Alexander Therpen and narrow down a list of suspects with each clue you uncover!

📜 Engaging Puzzles and Achievements!
Tackle intricate puzzles and macabre mini-games throughout your journey. Earn achievements as you advance through hidden object games, proving your expertise in piecing together complex criminal puzzles!

📜 Collectible Items!
Keep an eye out for curious collectibles and immersive extra content that enrich the gameplay experience. Make critical choices that influence the outcomes and fates of those involved in the shadows of crime!
